participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and family-oriented with a love for adventure and fun.
participant_1.background: i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i love to spend time with my family. i'm a baby delivery nurse. i walk three miles every day.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, enjoys outdoor activities and loves animals.
participant_2.background: i've three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.

content.text: what do you do for a living ?
